name: sf-digital-services-assignment
description: Website for take-home assignment from San Francisco Digital Services
author: Todd Wolfson <todd@twolfson.com> (http://twolfson.com/)

scripts.publish-to-gh-pages: npm run build && git diff --exit-code && gh-pages --dist build --branch gh-pages
scripts.start: (test -d build/ || npm run build) && serve build

releaseCommands._comment: Publish to `gh-pages` after `npm` so we get correct version number
